PerfectNetExp.abs: 此外还有执事（Deacon），作为牧师和长老的辅助者。Deacon在天主教中翻译为“助祭”。
他的父亲迪肯(Deacon)是这里的果岭维护员和职业球手，同时也是他的启蒙老师。湾丘是他的第二故乡。
在神父职位以下还有「助祭」(deacons),他们的职责是帮助神父施行圣礼,传道,和协助牧区教会的行政事务〔1569-1571〕.由主教按立 …
的近律师行(Deacons)是一间以香港为总部的律师事务所，提供独立的法律服务予客户。的近律师行成立于1851年，现时总部位于香港 …

list.abs: humbly anointed a church deacon also , God put in him a shepherd's heart and called him into full timea after the Life Church and Missions evolved .起初受按立为教会执事的志山传道在教会成立一年后，上帝就赐他牧者的心肠并呼召他成为教会的全职传道人。
deacon是什么意思_deacon的翻译_音标_读音... ... deacon1.  执事 john deacon1. 贝司手 grand deacon1.  主祭司.
2013年3月28日 - 尼古拉二世的1059年敕令:枢机选教皇,但得由枢机主教(Cardinal Bishop)先开会讨论人选,然后再召集枢机司铎(Cardinal Priest)和枢机执事(Cardinal Deacon).
deacidification 脱酸化deacon process 迪肯制氯法deactivation 去活

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English diacon, via ecclesiastical Latin from Greek diakonos 'servant' (in ecclesiastical Greek 'Christian minister')

entry.tran: (英国国教会等的)会吏;助祭;辅祭
entry.def: A deacon is a member of the clergy, for example in the Church of England, who is lower in rank than a priest.

entry.tran: (某些基督教新教教会的)执事
entry.def: A deacon is a person who is not ordained but who assists the minister in some Protestant churches.

means.word_mean: 1. a Protestant layman who assists the minister
2. a cleric ranking just below a priest in Christian churches; one of the Holy Orders
